categories: Category:Stormtrooper officers of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Lieutenant Hab was an officer who served the Imperial warlord Jerec, during the latter's search for the Force nexus known as the Valley of the Jedi.

Lieutenant Hab was an officer who served the Imperial warlord Jerec during his search for the Valley of the Jedi, a Force nexus containing numerous trapped Jedi souls. When the valley was discovered in 5 ABY on the planet Ruusan, Hab was among the troops assigned to excavate it under Major Vig.

The excavation works, however, were complicated by the presence of the spirits of the Jedi and Sith that roamed around the valley. One such spirit tried to suffocate Hab when the latter was having lunch. Hab, however, was rescued by Yun, one of Jerec's Dark Jedi.
Hab's first and as yet only appearance was in the 1998 novella Dark Forces: Jedi Knight, written by William C. Dietz. Hab's species and gender were never specified in the book.
